## IImageBitmap interface

A cross-environment interface for image bitmap objects that covers the properties and methods supported by both DOM (as ImageBitmap) and canvas-cleave (as NodeImageBitmap).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IImageBitmap 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [height](./canvas-cleave.iimagebitmap.height.md) | <code>number</code> | The height of the image bitmap. |
|  [width](./canvas-cleave.iimagebitmap.width.md) | <code>number</code> | The width of the image bitmap. |
